rooms.description: North-facing entrance with a welcoming vestibule featuring floor-to-ceiling windows to let in ample natural light, ensuring a Vastu compliant orientation.
Spacious area combining living and dining spaces with open layouts for a bohemian vibe; incorporates natural finishes and artistic elements. Floor-to-ceiling windows provide scenic views.

Modern kitchen design integrated into the living area for seamless movement, with high-quality fittings and an accent on local materials. Vastu-compliant placement with a north-east alignment to promote health.
Private bedroom space designed for comfort and tranquility; includes built-in storage solutions. Vastu principles suggest placement in the north-west sector.
Attached bathroom with efficient water drainage, ensuring privacy and Vastu compliance by avoiding direct alignment with the main entrance.
Dedicated living space for domestic staff, adhering to local building norms and offering a separate private area. Placed on the east side for ease of access.
Space allocated for storage, laundry, and other utilities; designed to keep clutter away from living areas.

openings.description: Large door complementing the floor-to-ceiling windows to maintain a seamless indoor-outdoor connection.
Floor-to-ceiling windows providing ample natural light, ensuring energy efficiency and alignment with Vastu principles.
Easily accessible swimming pool area integrated into the design to enhance recreational space while maintaining privacy.

rooms.description: Multi-functional room for work or study, designed with ambient lighting and ergonomic features, suitable for both professional and personal use.
Cozy guest bedroom providing privacy during stays; incorporates elements of bohemian design with local artisanal finishes.
Open space accessible from the bedrooms for relaxation and to enjoy views over the landscape; designed with privacy screens and integrated seating.

openings.location: East side of the ground floor
openings.description: Well-lit staircase providing safe and easy access between floors; includes guard rails and ample landing space.
Additional openings to maximize natural light and ventilation while maintaining privacy in line with Vastu guidelines.
